title: Mortgage Bonds, Home Lenders Jump as Trump Targets Housing Costs
description: Mortgage bonds rose and home-lender stocks rallied after President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of the securities in a move to bring down the cost of housing.
content: Mortgage bonds rose and home-lender stocks rallied after President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of the securities in a move to bring down the cost of housing.
